name: Getting work and being in work

tasks.name: I’m unemployed and trying to find work

subtasks.name: What kind of job could I do? (skills, interests, pay, location)
needs: I need to know what locations are feasible for me to consider for work?
What kind of work will support my mental wellbeing (for people with depression, anxiety etc.)

needs: I need to understand how much money I will take home from a new job
I need to understand what this will mean for my benefits entitlements (how much money I will have each week/fortnight/month)
I need to ensure I can afford to live (including any childcare and other costs required if working) once I have a job
I need to transition from ESA to JSA

I need a job in a location that is feasible for me to travel to
I need a job that matches the hours I’m able to work
I need a job that meets my financial requirements

needs: I’m considering further training and education to make me more employable
I’m considering volunteering to make me more employable

How do I ensure that I am claiming the benefits I am entitled to and nothing I am not entitled to so that I have the most money to live on but incur a penalty later.
